item.description:
THIS IS A MEETUP MASHUP WITH THE VEGOUT RI MEETUP GROUP!


Please be sure to RSVP with only one group, so we can keep the count accurate. Thanks!


Please join us for an afternoon of vegan barbecue by the bay! We've reserved site number 1 at Colt State Park (see map): Map of Colt State Park


We ask everyone to bring a vegan dish to share (no meat, poultry, fish, eggs or dairy). Feel free to make something for a picnic or something to throw on the bbq. (We'll bring aluminum foil to cover the grill!) In the interest of a greener meetup, please bring your own reusable utensils and plates if possible. Thanks!


We've got a nice big space with plenty of tables, so please bring family and friends. Just remember to add them to your RSVP!


If you have any questions, feel free to email me. See you there!



~Kerrie (& Alex)



P.S. For anyone who doesn't have a motorized vehicle of their own, there are a few options: 1) Let us know, and we can try and arrange carpooling, 2) the #60 bus (Providence-Newport) stops at the entrance to Colt State Park, and 3) the East Bay Bike Path passes right through the park.
item.how_to_find_us: "Come to Picnic Site 1 right near the water (see map in description)."

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Veggie MASH-UP Meet Up!
